channel.title: [Allstar] Allstar Full
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Vid of my anti null: ============== 100 % working anti null =============== [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q78BYzVrEGc&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] ============== 100 % working anti null ===============
[URL=http://info.flagcounter.com/S0Pm][IMG]http://s05.flagcounter.com/count/S0Pm/bg_FFFFFF/txt_000000/border_CCCCCC/columns_2/maxflags_12/viewers_0/labels_1/pageviews_1/flags_1/[/img][/URL]
Features so far(coded by Rush n Skill): - Lottery draws every hour(if potsize is 300m or above) --> it looks like raffle FS - random money from mining, agility, thieving. - Gem stealing than cut it for cash. - custom train - custom home - chocolate bars in starter inv (heals 45 hp) - custom bosses.. - Rares(nice idea FS) - pirate title unlocks at 10k or more pirate kills(rares) - dupes are fixed & shops aswell so players cannot cheat in shops all around server. - real RS slayer - custom yell drop like: < rares drop > (playername) just received: -- 1 x (item) --. - Highscores - all skills working. - custom items drops that for example increases xp or coin farming at stalls - active community ( already 250+ accounts made & still counting) - FULL procted server
View pictures of server:
home: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/6xrtoo.png[/img]
train: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2rmazoz.png[/img]
c shield effect: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/k1yiit.png[/img]
dicing: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2vm9176.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/24bok20.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/343pwft.png[/img]
skeleton armour( boots slayer experience) [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/25tz1gp.png[/img]
Lottery (Costs 100m to enter) [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/iejo61.jpg[/img]
view skills in action(random coin stealing): [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/34fe1w7.png[/img]
& more pics will be added.
Rush n Skill

item.title: [Allstar] Allstar Full

item.description:

[/quote]
Lol. All Keith would tell him is why not to package, why you should you name your classes client not Client, the reason why UpperCasing variables is good, and why ints should be used like booleans. <3

Gl with your project man. Will be following this. :)[/quote]

Thanks

and ReaperXScape, look on server status page it’s up :).

item.title: [Allstar] Allstar Full
item.dc:creator: @montana247 montana247
item.description:
@montana247 wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:8, topic:521492”][quote author=ReaperXScape link=topic=640003.msg4313257#msg4313257 date=1371070906]
Dude… you have too many loveing servers. im serious you have made like the same server over and over based off the same old source, seriously just keep it online. i dont wanna be a dick here, but you have had :

allstar-uria (still online)
montana (like 1 month ago)
joon scape(2 months ago)

and you keep making new servers just for new player base. montana and joon scape have been on and off, you have used those for atleast 7 different servers, all with the same base, seriously just host it and dont shut it down.

[/quote]He’s still in practice. Leave him be. Just because he’s been making a lot of different projects doesn’t mean he should be shunned for it. I actually support it. Whether or not it is the same source repeatedly used, that doesn’t matter to me. He’s building it. It’s basically the same thing I did a good while back with Uncalled Attack. I built up the same source over and over again. They were all different projects, but it was the same source throughout the majority of it. I’m glad that montana247 has been actively making development threads. It’s a great learning process for him.

Just because you disagree with him doesn’t mean that you should go about trying to shun him, but instead - you should support him. I suppose you could make a comment about the frequency of the developments, but don’t be rude about it. Support all of his projects, he desires to learn on how to do things correctly still. Give him tips, try to teach him some things, have him learn, and eventually - watch him grow to becoming a respectable member of the community. There’s no need to bring him down. I support all his projects.[/quote]

thank for supporrt

Read full topic

item.title: [Allstar] Allstar Full
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“ReaperXScape, post:4, topic:521492”]Dude… you have too many loveing servers. im serious you have made like the same server over and over based off the same old source, seriously just keep it online. i dont wanna be a dick here, but you have had :

allstar-uria (still online)
montana (like 1 month ago)
joon scape(2 months ago)

and you keep making new servers just for new player base. montana and joon scape have been on and off, you have used those for atleast 7 different servers, all with the same base, seriously just host it and dont shut it down.[/quote]He’s still in practice. Leave him be. Just because he’s been making a lot of different projects doesn’t mean he should be shunned for it. I actually support it. Whether or not it is the same source repeatedly used, that doesn’t matter to me. He’s building it. It’s basically the same thing I did a good while back with Uncalled Attack. I built up the same source over and over again. They were all different projects, but it was the same source throughout the majority of it. I’m glad that montana247 has been actively making development threads. It’s a great learning process for him.

Just because you disagree with him doesn’t mean that you should go about trying to shun him, but instead - you should support him. I suppose you could make a comment about the frequency of the developments, but don’t be rude about it. Support all of his projects, he desires to learn on how to do things correctly still. Give him tips, try to teach him some things, have him learn, and eventually - watch him grow to becoming a respectable member of the community. There’s no need to bring him down. I support all his projects.

Read full topic
